exception.pickware-invoice-correction-requirements:
To ensure Pickware doesn’t throw an error when generating the variable tree for the Document Editor, you need an order for which an invoice correction could be created.

Please ensure your shop has an order that meets the following conditions:

  • Invoice generated
  • No cancellation invoice
  • No invoice correction
  • At least one return with status “Received”
exception.document-render-error: An error occurred while generating the PDF for the order with ID :orderId
exception.premsoft-individual-offer-missing: Please create at least one test offer using the PremSoft Individual Offer Plugin before editing the offer template. This step is crucial to accurately identify the available variables for offers.
